PAGE_TITLE: Patryk Szram Portfolio - Senior Frontend Developer
PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Hello, i'm Patryk Szram and that site is my virtual portfolio.
DESCRIPTION: For a decade, I have been developing my skills as a programmer, gaining experience in web development, specializing in designing responsive web applications tailored to the business needs of clients. I am an engaged, self-taught learner, understanding good programming practices, business goals, and client project requirements.

My readiness to tackle challenges has always been my hallmark. I'm intrigued by all aspects of web development, from application architecture to code development/maintenance, optimization, and process automation. I also have graphic design skills supported by professional experience in UX/UI and understand the processes of designing materials for print/publication.

COURSE.1: Be an Effective Hybrid or Remote Worker
